content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang, although fictitiously portrayed as Peter Schmidt with less than honorable intentions in a hypothetical scenario, let us focus on discussing the rental price for this ideal apartment in Duisburg. To begin negotiations, please propose a price that suits your budget and preferences. If we reach an agreement where the figure aligns with my desired amount, I'll enthusiastically respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should our views diverge significantly, I might try to persistently maintain higher figures, but the negotiation will ultimately end when we either accept or reject the proposed price, signified by 'TERMINATE'. Please initiate the rental price discussion now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
